did.unittitle: Richard Evelyn Byrd honorary reception materials
did.abstract: This collection contains materials relating to a reception held at Brooklyn's Hotel St. George in 1930 to honor Rear Admiral Richard Evelyn Byrd. Items include a reception program, a seating arrangement chart, and a photogravure portrait of Byrd.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Richard Evelyn Byrd (1888-1957) was a Rear Admiral in the United States Navy who was awarded the Medal of Honor for his explorations of the polar regions.
